short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: XplainAI is a powerful Chrome extension that helps you understand and analyze text content directly within your browser. Simply…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
XplainAI is a powerful Chrome extension that helps you understand and analyze text content directly within your browser. Simply select any text on a webpage, and XplainAI provides instant explanations, summaries, and answers to your questions about the selected content.

Key Features:
• Smart Text Selection: Easily select any text on a webpage to analyze
• Instant Summaries: Get quick, concise summaries of selected content
• Contextual Q&A: Ask specific questions about the selected text
• User-Friendly Interface: Clean, intuitive design with drag-and-drop functionality
• Free Tier Access: Start with complimentary daily prompts
• API Integration: Connect your OpenAI API key for unlimited usage

Perfect for:
- Students researching complex topics
- Professionals analyzing documents
- Researchers reviewing technical content
- Anyone seeking quick understanding of written content

Privacy & Security:
• No data storage: Your selections and queries are processed in real-time
• Secure authentication: Google Sign-in integration
• Optional API key: Use your own OpenAI API key for enhanced privacy

Get started with XplainAI today and transform how you interact with online content!
